name: rwty1
script:
library(devtools)
#install_github("danlwarren/RWTY")
library(rwty)
library(cardoonTools)

data(fungus)
#plotparams <- c("LnL", "pi.A.", "pi.T.")
plotparams <- c("")
trees<-fungus$Fungus.Run1
burnin = 20

#myobject <- makeplot.pairs(fungus$Fungus.Run1, burnin = 20, params = plotparams)

plotobject <- function(trees, burnin, params){
   makeplot.pairs(trees, burnin, plotparams)
}
  
rwtyPlot = cardoonPlot(expression(plotobject(trees,burnin,plotparams)), width=1000, height=1000, res=100)
rwtyPlot = rwtyPlot$png
